11/*
12 * WebRTC's wrapper to libyuv.
13 */
14
15#ifndef COMMON_VIDEO_LIBYUV_INCLUDE_WEBRTC_LIBYUV_H_
16#define COMMON_VIDEO_LIBYUV_INCLUDE_WEBRTC_LIBYUV_H_
17
18#include <stdint.h>
19#include <stdio.h>
20
21#include <vector>
22
23#include "api/scoped_refptr.h"
24#include "api/video/video_frame.h"
25#include "api/video/video_frame_buffer.h"
26#include "rtc_base/system/rtc_export.h"
27
28namespace webrtc {
29
30enum class VideoType {
31 kUnknown,
32 kI420,
33 kIYUV,
34 kRGB24,
35 kARGB,
36 kRGB565,
37 kYUY2,
38 kYV12,
39 kUYVY,
40 kMJPEG,
41 kBGRA,
42};
43
44// This is the max PSNR value our algorithms can return.
45const double kPerfectPSNR = 48.0f;
46
47// Calculate the required buffer size.
48// Input:
49// - type :The type of the designated video frame.
50// - width :frame width in pixels.
51// - height :frame height in pixels.
52// Return value: :The required size in bytes to accommodate the specified
53// video frame.
54size_t CalcBufferSize(VideoType type, int width, int height);
55
56// Extract buffer from VideoFrame or I420BufferInterface (consecutive
57// planes, no stride)
58// Input:
59// - frame : Reference to video frame.
60// - size : pointer to the size of the allocated buffer. If size is
61// insufficient, an error will be returned.
62// - buffer : Pointer to buffer
63// Return value: length of buffer if OK, < 0 otherwise.
64int ExtractBuffer(const rtc::scoped_refptr<I420BufferInterface>& input_frame,
65 size_t size,
66 uint8_t* buffer);
67int ExtractBuffer(const VideoFrame& input_frame, size_t size, uint8_t* buffer);
68// Convert From I420
69// Input:
70// - src_frame : Reference to a source frame.
71// - dst_video_type : Type of output video.
72// - dst_sample_size : Required only for the parsing of MJPG.
73// - dst_frame : Pointer to a destination frame.
74// Return value: 0 if OK, < 0 otherwise.
75// It is assumed that source and destination have equal height.
76int ConvertFromI420(const VideoFrame& src_frame,
77 VideoType dst_video_type,
78 int dst_sample_size,
79 uint8_t* dst_frame);
80
81rtc::scoped_refptr<I420BufferInterface> ScaleVideoFrameBuffer(
82 const I420BufferInterface& source,
83 int dst_width,
84 int dst_height);
85
86double I420SSE(const I420BufferInterface& ref_buffer,
87 const I420BufferInterface& test_buffer);
88
89// Compute PSNR for an I420 frame (all planes).
90// Returns the PSNR in decibel, to a maximum of kInfinitePSNR.
91double I420PSNR(const VideoFrame* ref_frame, const VideoFrame* test_frame);
92double I420PSNR(const I420BufferInterface& ref_buffer,
93 const I420BufferInterface& test_buffer);
94
95// Compute SSIM for an I420 frame (all planes).
96double I420SSIM(const VideoFrame* ref_frame, const VideoFrame* test_frame);
97double I420SSIM(const I420BufferInterface& ref_buffer,
98 const I420BufferInterface& test_buffer);
99
100// Helper function for scaling NV12 to NV12.
101// If the |src_width| and |src_height| matches the |dst_width| and |dst_height|,
102// then |tmp_buffer| is not used. In other cases, the minimum size of
103// |tmp_buffer| should be:
104// (src_width/2) * (src_height/2) * 2 + (dst_width/2) * (dst_height/2) * 2
105void NV12Scale(uint8_t* tmp_buffer,
106 const uint8_t* src_y,
107 int src_stride_y,
108 const uint8_t* src_uv,
109 int src_stride_uv,
110 int src_width,
111 int src_height,
112 uint8_t* dst_y,
113 int dst_stride_y,
114 uint8_t* dst_uv,
115 int dst_stride_uv,
116 int dst_width,
117 int dst_height);
118
119// Helper class for directly converting and scaling NV12 to I420. The Y-plane
120// will be scaled directly to the I420 destination, which makes this faster
121// than separate NV12->I420 + I420->I420 scaling.
122class RTC_EXPORT NV12ToI420Scaler {
123 public:
124 NV12ToI420Scaler();
125 ~NV12ToI420Scaler();
126 void NV12ToI420Scale(const uint8_t* src_y,
127 int src_stride_y,
128 const uint8_t* src_uv,
129 int src_stride_uv,
130 int src_width,
131 int src_height,
132 uint8_t* dst_y,
133 int dst_stride_y,
134 uint8_t* dst_u,
135 int dst_stride_u,
136 uint8_t* dst_v,
137 int dst_stride_v,
138 int dst_width,
139 int dst_height);
140
141 private:
142 std::vector<uint8_t> tmp_uv_planes_;
143};
144
145// Convert VideoType to libyuv FourCC type
146int ConvertVideoType(VideoType video_type);
147
148} // namespace webrtc
149
150#endif // COMMON_VIDEO_LIBYUV_INCLUDE_WEBRTC_LIBYUV_H_
151
